subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Parise, who appeared in All-Star Games in 1970 and 1973, helped the Islanders win their first playoff series, arriving in a trade from the Minnesota North Stars in 1975.
snippet: Parise, who appeared in All-Star Games in 1970 and 1973, helped the Islanders win their first playoff series, arriving in a trade from the Minnesota North Stars in 1975.
